trans-unit.source: Defines a relationship between two entity types based on an association in the conceptual model.
trans-unit.target: 定义基于概念模型中的关联的两个实体类型之间的关系。

trans-unit.source: This attribute is applied at the assembly level with one instance for each association.
trans-unit.target: 此属性以程序集级别应用于的每个关联的一个实例。

trans-unit.source: There can be multiple attributes of this type in an assembly.
trans-unit.target: 可以有多个属性，此类型的程序集。

trans-unit.source: The details for the role of an entity type in a particular association should match the association defined in the conceptual schema.
trans-unit.target: 特定关联中实体类型的角色的详细信息应匹配概念性架构中定义的关联。

trans-unit.source: An association does not define any ordering for the roles.
trans-unit.target: 关联不会定义角色的任何排序。

trans-unit.source: This means that properties that define the related ends of an association can be defined in any order.
trans-unit.target: 这意味着可以按任何顺序来定义用于定义的相关的端关联的属性。

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of the <xref href="System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EdmRelationshipAttribute"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 创建的实例<xref href="System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EdmRelationshipAttribute"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: The `typeof` operator (`GetType` in Visual Basic) is used to return the <xref:System.Type> object for an object.
trans-unit.target: `typeof`运算符 (`GetType`在 Visual Basic 中) 用于返回<xref:System.Type>对象的对象。</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: The name of the namespace for the association in which this entity participates.
trans-unit.target: 此实体所参与的关联的命名空间名称。

trans-unit.source: The name of a relationship in which this entity participates.
trans-unit.target: 此实体所参与的关系的名称。

trans-unit.source: Name of the role for the type at one end of the association.
trans-unit.target: 某一端的关联的类型的角色名称。

trans-unit.source: A value of <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.RelationshipMultiplicity"></xref> that indicates the multiplicity at one end of the association, such as one or many.
trans-unit.target: 值为<xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.RelationshipMultiplicity"> </xref> ，该值指示某一端的关联，例如一个或多个多重性。

trans-unit.source: The type of the entity at one end of the association.
trans-unit.target: 在关联的另一端的实体类型。

trans-unit.source: Name of the role for the type at the other end of the association.
trans-unit.target: 关联另一端的类型的角色名称。

trans-unit.source: A value of <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.RelationshipMultiplicity"></xref> that indicates the multiplicity at the other end of the association, such as one or many.
trans-unit.target: 值为<xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.RelationshipMultiplicity"> </xref> ，该值指示在另一端的关联，例如一或多个多重性。

trans-unit.source: The type of the entity at the other end of the association.
trans-unit.target: 关联另一端的实体类型。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EdmRelationshipAttribute"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EdmRelationshipAttribute"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: The name of the namespace for the association in which this entity participates.
trans-unit.target: 此实体所参与的关联的命名空间名称。

trans-unit.source: The name of a relationship in which this entity participates.
trans-unit.target: 此实体所参与的关系的名称。

trans-unit.source: Name of the role for the type at one end of the association.
trans-unit.target: 某一端的关联的类型的角色名称。

trans-unit.source: A value of <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.RelationshipMultiplicity"></xref> that indicates the multiplicity at one end of the association, such as one or many.
trans-unit.target: 值为<xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.RelationshipMultiplicity"> </xref> ，该值指示某一端的关联，例如一个或多个多重性。

trans-unit.source: The type of the entity at one end of the association.
trans-unit.target: 在关联的另一端的实体类型。

trans-unit.source: Name of the role for the type at the other end of the association.
trans-unit.target: 关联另一端的类型的角色名称。

trans-unit.source: A value of <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.RelationshipMultiplicity"></xref> that indicates the multiplicity at the other end of the association, such as one or many.
trans-unit.target: 值为<xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.RelationshipMultiplicity"> </xref> ，该值指示在另一端的关联，例如一或多个多重性。

trans-unit.source: The type of the entity at the other end of the association.
trans-unit.target: 关联另一端的实体类型。

trans-unit.source: A value that indicates whether the relationship is based on the foreign key value.
trans-unit.target: 一个值，该值指示关系基于外键值。

trans-unit.source: Gets a Boolean value that indicates whether the relationship is based on the foreign key value.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个布尔值，该值指示关系基于外键值。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the relationship is based on the foreign key value; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果关系基于外键值;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Name of the relationship.
trans-unit.target: 关系的名称。

trans-unit.source: The name of the relationship is specified by the `Name` attribute of the `Association` element that defines this relationship in the conceptual model.
trans-unit.target: 关系的名称由指定`Name`属性`Association`概念模型中定义此关系的元素。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [CSDL, SSDL, and MSL Specifications](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[CSDL、 SSDL 和 MSL 规范](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that is the name of a relationship that is defined by this <xref href="System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EdmRelationshipAttribute"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.String>，它是定义此关系的名称<xref href="System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EdmRelationshipAttribute"> </xref>。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The namespace for the relationship.
trans-unit.target: 命名空间中的关系。

trans-unit.source: The namespace of the relationship is specified by the `Namespace` attribute of the `Schema` element that contains association that defines this relationship in the conceptual model.
trans-unit.target: 指定关系的命名空间`Namespace`属性`Schema`包含概念模型中定义此关系的关联的元素。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [CSDL, SSDL, and MSL Specifications](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[CSDL、 SSDL 和 MSL 规范](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that is the namespace for the relationship.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.String>，它是关系的命名空间。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Multiplicity at one end of the relationship.
trans-unit.target: 关系的另一端的重数。

trans-unit.source: Properties that define the related ends of an association can be defined in any order.
trans-unit.target: 可以按任何顺序定义定义关联的相关的端的属性。

trans-unit.source: The multiplicity is specified by the `Multiplicity` attribute of the `End` element in the association that defines this relationship in the conceptual model.
trans-unit.target: 通过指定多重性`Multiplicity`属性`End`概念模型中定义此关系的关联中的元素。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [CSDL, SSDL, and MSL Specifications](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[CSDL、 SSDL 和 MSL 规范](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.RelationshipMultiplicity"></xref> value that indicates the multiplicity.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.RelationshipMultiplicity"> </xref>值，该值指示重数。

trans-unit.source: Name of the role at one end of the relationship.
trans-unit.target: 关系的另一端的角色名称。

trans-unit.source: The role name is specified by the `Role` attribute of the `End` element in the association that defines this relationship in the conceptual model.
trans-unit.target: 角色名称由指定`Role`属性`End`概念模型中定义此关系的关联中的元素。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [CSDL, SSDL, and MSL Specifications](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[CSDL、 SSDL 和 MSL 规范](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that is the name of the role.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.String>，它是角色的名称。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Type of the entity at one end of the relationship.
trans-unit.target: 关系的另一端的实体的类型。

trans-unit.source: Properties that define the related ends of an association can be defined in any order.
trans-unit.target: 可以按任何顺序定义定义关联的相关的端的属性。

trans-unit.source: The type name is specified by the `Type` attribute of the `End` element in the association that defines this relationship in the conceptual model.
trans-unit.target: 类型名称由指定`Type`属性`End`概念模型中定义此关系的关联中的元素。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [CSDL, SSDL, and MSL Specifications](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[CSDL、 SSDL 和 MSL 规范](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Type> that is the type of the object at this end of the association.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Type>类型关联的这一端的对象。</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Multiplicity at the other end of the relationship.
trans-unit.target: 关系另一端的重数。

trans-unit.source: Properties that define the related ends of an association can be defined in any order.
trans-unit.target: 可以按任何顺序定义定义关联的相关的端的属性。

trans-unit.source: The multiplicity is specified by the `Multiplicity` attribute of the `End` element in the association that defines this relationship in the conceptual model.
trans-unit.target: 通过指定多重性`Multiplicity`属性`End`概念模型中定义此关系的关联中的元素。

trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.RelationshipMultiplicity"> </xref>值，该值指示重数。

trans-unit.source: Properties that define the related ends of an association can be defined in any order.
trans-unit.target: 可以按任何顺序定义定义关联的相关的端的属性。

trans-unit.target: 可以按任何顺序定义定义关联的相关的端的属性。
